meanings.sent1: We watched the motocrosses race around the track.
meanings.sent2: The motocrosses event was thrilling to watch.
meanings.sent3: The motocrosses were so fast, they looked like colorful blurs.
meanings.sent4: The motocrosses of dirt bikes resembled a symphony of speed and skill.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the motocrosses echoed through the valley.

meanings.definition: motocrosses: third person singular present of motocross
meanings.sent1: He motocrosses through the rugged terrain effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: She motocrosses every weekend at the local track.
meanings.sent3: The way he motocrosses around obstacles is like a dance.
meanings.sent4: Her determination motocrosses over any challenges she faces.
meanings.sent5: The excitement builds as he motocrosses towards the finish line.
